name: Sacrarium Pario
description:
Another betrayal was unsurprising in your life, but you never expected the consequences to be like this.

Sacrarium Pario is a short visual novel that focuses on the interactions between a down on their luck mercenary (name and pronouns customizable) and the living gods they were always taught to be wary of.

That mercenary expected to die or be sold on the black market after being betrayed by a confidant. No one in their right might have anticipated the living god, Violo to take an interest in them. Now, each day is a matter of survival. Violo's fascination is infamously mercurial, and his eternal companion, Vivere, is not pleased with sharing his lover's attention. Death looms overhead.... but so does the threat of finding the men beneath the monsters. 

Will they survive? Will they escape? Will they stay?

That will be up to you.

The demo was made for Yandere Game Jam 2023.

The Love Interests: Full Game Features:
  • Customizable first name, last name, and gender for the main character
  • Partial VO for Violo & Vivere
  • A pair of yandere LIs you can enter a polyamorous relationship with or a weird friendship
  • Multiple Endings
    • Multiple "Dead" Ends 
      • You'd better make sure that their affection doesn't drop too low. Unless you want your stay to end...abruptly.
    • 3 Bad Ends
      • Sometimes there are fates worse than death.
    • 1 Neutral End
      • Is escape possible?
    • 2 Good Ends
      • Sometimes you have to make the best out of a bad situation.
